arts.ttl: Unstoppable Pulisic leads his side in crazy AC Milan win
arts.sum: Ismaël Bennacer (45', Rafael Leão), Davide Bartesaghi (45', Theo Hernández), Tammy Abraham (56', Álvaro Morata), Samuel Chukwueze (56', Youssouf Fofana), Pontus Almqvist (68', Dennis Man), Anas Haj Mohamed (69', Hernani), Drissa Camara (69', Milan Djuric), Mathias Løvik (76', Valentin Mihaila), Luka Jovic (76', Davide Calabria), Antoine Hainaut (82', Matteo Cancellieri) Álvaro Morata, flanked by Christian Pulisic and Rafael Leão in attack, led Milan’s early efforts, but parity was broken in the 24th minute.

arts.ttl: AC Milan boss on fight after win: 'Not a church'
arts.sum: The drama did not end with the final whistle at the San Siro after AC Milan snatched a late win over Parma on Sunday, but manager Sergio Conceição brushed off his heated clash with Davide Calabria, blaming adrenaline and passion.

arts.ttl: Kyle Walker's new AC Milan boss and captain in heated post-match clash as pair speak out
arts.sum: Kyle Walker watched from the stands as new club AC Milan scored twice in added time to beat Parma 2-1, leading to a clash between manager Sergio Conceicao and club captain Davide Calabria

arts.ttl: European roundup: Walker watches on as Milan earn last-gasp win over Parma
arts.sum: Tijjani Reijnders and Samuel Chukwueze score late goals Christian Pulisic also on the mark in comeback triumph Two added time goals from Tijjani Reijnders and Samuel Chukwueze earned Milan an unlikely 3-2 win at home to struggling Parma in a dramatic game at the San Siro on Sunday. The win moves Milan to sixth in the standings on 34 points, while Parma are just above the relegation zone in 17th with 20 points. Parma took the lead in the 24th minute through Matteo Cancellieri before Milan equalised from the penalty spot, with Christian Pulisic converting seven minutes before the break. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Milan’s Calabria: “Confrontation with Conceicao? Just a Misunderstanding, I Apologise. It’s Not an Easy Season”
arts.sum: AC Milan staged a dramatic comeback to defeat Parma 3-2 at San Siro in the 22nd round of Serie A, with Tijjani Reijnders and Samuel Chukwueze scoring the equalizer and winning goal after the 90th minute. The post Milan’s Calabria: “Confrontation with Conceicao? Just a Misunderstanding, I Apologise. It’s Not an Easy Season” appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Milan’s Conceicao: “Transfer Market? I’ve Asked for Players, Otherwise We’ll Go to War with What We Have”
arts.sum: AC Milan staged a dramatic comeback to defeat Parma 3-2 at San Siro in the 22nd round of Serie A, with Tijjani Reijnders and Samuel Chukwueze scoring the equalizer and winning goal after the 90th minute. arts.ttl: Milan boss Sergio Conceicao after scuffle with defender Davide Calabria: “If I have a son who misbehaves, I tell him”
arts.sum: Serie A giants Milan grabbed a dramatic 3-2 win over Parma but it is what happened after the game that attracted a lot of attention. The Rossoneri were 2-1 down…

arts.ttl: Milan’s Davide Calabria speaks after scuffle with manager Sergio Conceicao: “We cleared things up”
arts.sum: Serie A giants Milan grabbed a dramatic 3-2 win over Parma but it is what happened after the game that attracted a lot of attention. The Rossoneri were 2-1 down…

arts.ttl: AC Milan provides drama at the San Siro with 2 late goals in 3-2 comeback win over Parma
arts.sum: Conceição also guided Milan to comeback wins over Juventus and Inter Milan en route to the Italian Super Cup trophy to start the month. But after beating Parma, Milan moved up to sixth place and back into contention for the Champions League places.

arts.ttl: Conceicao and Calabria clash at full-time after Milan 3-2 Parma comeback
arts.sum: Milan’s coach and captain, Sergio Conceicao and Davide Calabria, were involved in a heated argument...
